1217120.name: Riftnote
1217120.description:
Riftnote is an application for creating, storing and organizing notes in a 3D space. Reflect your thoughts, collect ideas and visualize goals all in one place.

IMMERSIVE GRAPHICS

Riftnote is built and run using Unity game engine which means you are able to experience rich and colorful graphics and literally dive into yourself at 60fps.

SIMPLE CONTROLS

Using Riftnote is very easy. There are only 7 basic commands that are carefully mapped to your keyboard so you and your creativity can flow as one.

YOUR PERSONAL

All changes you make are automatically saved locally on your PC, so no personal data is sent over the internet connection. Only you have access to it.
